alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 12:11PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia and northeastern Hamilton Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Belmont, or 14 miles south of Fargo, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Taylor and Belmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
